deity_markdown: [Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=425), [Aroden](/Deities.aspx?ID=512), [Bergelmir](/Deities.aspx?ID=491), [Casandalee](/Deities.aspx?ID=335), [Genzaeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=342), [Geryon](/Deities.aspx?ID=398), [Gruhastha](/Deities.aspx?ID=346), [Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice)](/Deities.aspx?ID=575), [Pahti Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=414), [Pillars of Knowledge](/Deities.aspx?ID=209), [Saloc](/Deities.aspx?ID=547), [Shei](/Deities.aspx?ID=653), [Tolte Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=415), [Vale](/Deities.aspx?ID=551), [Zohls](/Deities.aspx?ID=489)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Hypercognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1563)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 336 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=425), [Aroden](/Deities.aspx?ID=512), [Bergelmir](/Deities.aspx?ID=491), [Casandalee](/Deities.aspx?ID=335), [Genzaeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=342), [Geryon](/Deities.aspx?ID=398), [Gruhastha](/Deities.aspx?ID=346), [Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice)](/Deities.aspx?ID=575), [Pahti Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=414), [Pillars of Knowledge](/Deities.aspx?ID=209), [Saloc](/Deities.aspx?ID=547), [Shei](/Deities.aspx?ID=653), [Tolte Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=415), [Vale](/Deities.aspx?ID=551), [Zohls](/Deities.aspx?ID=489)

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Memory](/Lessons.aspx?ID=31)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You rapidly catalog and collate information relevant to your current situation. You can instantly use up to 6 [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) actions as part of Casting this Spell. For these actions, you can't use any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when you Recall Knowledge.
name: Hypercognition

<summary>
Recall massive amounts of information in an instant.
</summary>
summary: Recall massive amounts of information in an instant.
summary_markdown: Recall massive amounts of information in an instant.
text: Hypercognition Single Action Source Player Core pg. 336 2.0 Tradition Occult Deities Abraxas, Aroden, Bergelmir, Casandalee, Genzaeri, Geryon, Gruhastha, Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice), Pahti Coatl, Pillars of Knowledge, Saloc, Shei, Tolte Coatl, Vale, Zohls Lesson Lesson of Memory --- You rapidly catalog and collate information relevant to your current situation. You can instantly use up to 6 Recall Knowledge actions as part of Casting this Spell. For these actions, you can't use any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when you Recall Knowledge.
